# Connect to PostgreSQL database

The database has the following tables:

```{r db_connect, results='markup'}

con <- dbConnect(
  RPostgres::Postgres(),
  dbname = "ccardesa",
  host = "localhost",
  port = "5432",
  password = "wagb$^6DF",
  user = "postgres",
  service = NULL
)

# List tables associated with a specific schema
dbGetQuery(con,
           "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables
                   WHERE table_schema='public'") %>% kable(caption = "CCARDESA PostgreSQL Tables") %>% kable_styling("striped", full_width = T)



```

# Analyse R data frames

This chunk analyses the R data frames.

Questions
How many satellite missions are operating?
What satellites are operating?
What instruments are on the satellites?
Which institutions operate the missions?
What types of instruments (active or passive) are most common?
What is the main focus of the instruments/missions?
How has the spatial, spectral and temporal resolution changed over time (are there trade-offs among those resolutions)?

What data products are available?
What kind of data processing has taken place?
Where are the products archived?
Which institutions manage the archives?
Are there restrictions to the archives?
What tools do the archives provide to help users?

What are some of the applications of EO data for climate smart agriculture?
Which data products/instruments/missions do the applications use?
Which archives do the applications use?
What other services do the applications use?
Which institutions develop the applications?
Which donors support the applications?

How many users were invited to the survey?
From which countries were they invited?
From which disciplines (defined by us) were they invited?

How many users completed (fully or partially) the survey?
From which countries were the respondents?
From which disciplines (defined by respondent) were the respondents?


For remote sensing experts:

Which missions/satellites/instruments are the best-known?
Which missions/satellites/instruments are the most often used?
What are the reasons for not using missions/satellites/instruments?

Which archives are the best-known?
Which archives are the most often used?
What are the reasons for not using archives?

Which services are the most often used?
Which networks are the most often used?

For GIS experts:

What are the most common applications of EO data?
Which EO data products are the most often used?
What are the reasons for not using EO data products?
What would improve the impact of use of EO data products?



For decision-makers/facilitators/others:

What are the most common types of decisions that are relevant for Climate Smart Agriculture?
What are the most common types of information products used?
What are the reasons for not using information products?
What would improve or make more likely the use of information products?



## Satellite Missions

```{r mission_analysis, results='markup'}

# How many satellite missions (relevant for CSA EO) are operating?

sat_miss_count <- nrow(mission_df)
cat("Number of Missions = ", sat_miss_count)

# Which institutions operate the missions?

mission_inst_join_df <- left_join(left_join(mission_inst_df, mission_df, by = ("mission_id")), institution_df, by = ("inst_id"))

mission_inst_distinct_df <- left_join(mission_inst_df, institution_df, by = ("inst_id"), keep = FALSE) %>% dplyr::select(-inst_id, -mission_id) %>% distinct()

mission_inst_distinct_df %>% kable(caption = "Mission Operators") %>% kable_styling("striped", full_width = T)

# How many distinct institutions operate missions?

mission_inst_distinct_count <- nrow(mission_inst_distinct_df)

cat("Number of Operators = ", mission_inst_distinct_count)

# Where are those institutions based?

mission_inst_distinct_spdf <- st_as_sf(drop_na(mission_inst_distinct_df), coords = c("inst_address_x", "inst_address_y"), crs = 4326) # some institutions have no coords so drop NAs

mission_operator_map <-
  
  ggplot(world) +
  geom_sf() +
  geom_sf(data = mission_inst_distinct_spdf) +
  labs(title = "Institutions Operating EO Missions") +
  theme_bw() +   theme(
    axis.title.x = element_blank()
  )

mission_operator_map

# What type of institutions are they?

mission_operator_barchart <-
  
  ggplot(mission_inst_distinct_df) +
  geom_bar(aes(inst_type), stat = "count") +
  labs(title = "Types of Institutions Operating EO Missions") +
  theme_bw() +   theme(
    axis.title.x = element_blank()
  )

mission_operator_barchart
```

## EO Satellites

```{r satellite_analysis, results='markup'}
# What satellites are operating?

satellite_count <- nrow(satellite_df)

cat("Number of EO Satellites = ", satellite_count)


# What satellites are operating and for which I have information about the instruments?

satellite_instrument_distinct_df <- satellite_instrument_df %>% dplyr::select(-instrument_id) %>% distinct()

satellite_instrument_count <- nrow(satellite_instrument_distinct_df)

cat("Number of EO Satellites with information about instruments = ", satellite_instrument_count)


# What satellites are operating and for which I have information about the instruments, and which have active instruments?

satellite_instrument_join_df <- left_join(left_join(satellite_instrument_df, satellite_df, by = ("satellite_id")), instrument_df, by = ("instrument_id"))

satellite_instrument_join_distinct_df <- satellite_instrument_join_df %>% dplyr::filter(operating == T) %>% dplyr::select(satellite_id) %>% distinct()

satellite_instrument_join_distinct_count <- nrow(satellite_instrument_join_distinct_df)

cat("Number of EO Satellites with information about instruments which are functioning = ", satellite_instrument_join_distinct_count)
```

## EO Instruments

```{r instrument_analysis, results='markup'}

# What types of instruments (active or passive) are most common?

satellite_instrument_barchart <-
  
  ggplot(satellite_instrument_join_df) +
  geom_bar(aes(sensor_type), stat = "count") +
  labs(title = "Most Common Types of Instruments") +
  theme_bw() +   theme(
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = rel(1), angle = 0, hjust=0.5, vjust=0),
    )

satellite_instrument_barchart


# What is the main focus of the instruments/satellites/missions?

mission_satellite_instrument_focus_join_df <- left_join(left_join(left_join(left_join(left_join(satellite_instrument_df, satellite_df, by = ("satellite_id")), instrument_df, by = ("instrument_id")), mission_satellite_df, by = ("satellite_id")), mission_df, by = ("mission_id")), instrument_focus_df, by = ("instrument_id"))

mission_satellite_instrument_focus_barchart <-
  
  ggplot(mission_satellite_instrument_focus_join_df) +
  geom_bar(aes(focus), stat = "count") +
  labs(title = "Most Common Focus of Instruments") +
  theme_bw() +   theme(
    axis.title.x = element_blank()
  )

mission_satellite_instrument_focus_barchart

# How has the spatial, spectral and temporal resolution changed over time (are there trade-offs among those resolutions)?

satellite_instrument_join_df$launch_date_num <- as.Date(as.numeric(as.character(satellite_instrument_join_df$launch_date)), origin = "1899-12-30")  # Convert launch_date to date, dates were converted previously in Excel to the number of days after 30th December 1899

satellite_instrument_join_df$spat_res_num <- as.numeric(as.character(satellite_instrument_join_df$spat_res))  # Convert spat_res to numeric

satellite_instrument_join_df$bands_num <- as.numeric(as.character(satellite_instrument_join_df$bands))  # Convert bands to numeric

satellite_instrument_join_df$period_num <- as.numeric(as.character(satellite_instrument_join_df$period))  # Convert period to numeric



satellite_instrument_spatres_linechart <-
  
  ggplot(satellite_instrument_join_df, aes(launch_date_num, spat_res_num)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = lm, se = T, colour = "dark green") +
  labs(title = "Spatial Resolution of Instruments Over Time") +
  theme_bw() +   theme(
    axis.title.x = element_blank()
  )

satellite_instrument_spatres_linechart

satellite_instrument_bands_linechart <-
  
  ggplot(satellite_instrument_join_df, aes(launch_date_num, bands_num)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = lm, se = T, colour = "dark blue") +
  labs(title = "Spectral Resolution of Instruments Over Time") +
  theme_bw() +   theme(
    axis.title.x = element_blank()
  )

satellite_instrument_bands_linechart

satellite_instrument_period_linechart <-
  
  ggplot(satellite_instrument_join_df, aes(launch_date_num, period_num)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = lm, se = T, colour = "dark red") +
  labs(title = "Periodicity of Instruments Over Time") +
  theme_bw() +   theme(
    axis.title.x = element_blank()
  )

satellite_instrument_period_linechart

```

#### Which missions do the applications use?

```{r EO_Applications_missions, results='markup'}

application_mission_join_df  %>% kable(caption = "Missions used in applications") %>% kable_styling("striped", full_width = T)

application_mission_barchart <-
  
  ggplot(application_mission_join_df) +
  geom_bar(aes(mission_name), stat = "count") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = Application_count, colour = "dark grey", linetype = 2) +
  geom_text(y = Application_count, x = 0, label = ("100% of Applications"), colour = "dark grey", hjust = -0.25, vjust = -0.25 ) +

  theme_bw() +   theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = rel(0.5), angle = 90, hjust=1, vjust=0)
    )

```
